DescriptionData.Title: Personal Air Cooler, Portable Mini Air Conditioner, 4-In-1 Humidifier Cooler, 3-Speed Desktop Cooling Fan, Suitable For Home, Room, Office
DescriptionData.Description:
✔ You want to stay cool in the hot summer, but worry that it will cost a lot to run the air conditioner all day, and ordinary fans will only blow warm air to your face.

✔ Do you want a better way to calm down?
Use our mini air cooler to get this personal space cooler to create your comfort zone. Just add water and ice to the water tank, then relax and enjoy a fresh and moist breath.

✔ Cooling fan and humidifier
The air conditioner, portable evaporative air cooler and atomizing humidifier are combined into one, which can humidify the skin and air, keep away from the dry air, and enjoy the coolness of summer.

✔ Fresh air and enjoy a healthy life
It reduces the temperature by water evaporation and produces fresh air. Low power consumption and long humidification time! It is energy efficient and low carbon.

✔ Portable personal air cooler
Mini personal air cooler designed for personal use, please place no more than 3 feet to 4 feet.

✔ Package includes:
1 x air conditioner
1 x USB data cable
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ✔ 4-in-1 design: This evaporative air cooler has portable fan cooling, spray humidification, air purification and 4-in-1 functions of 7 LED lights, which not only reduces the temperature, but also helps us avoid dry air. In addition, it has a 7-color LED ambient light, and a soft and colorful LED light built in to create a romantic atmosphere and provide you with a better sleeping environment.

✔ 3 speed adjustment: Our mini air conditioner is designed with 3 speed modes, which can be freely adjusted according to your requirements (low / medium / high). If necessary, you can also adjust the wind direction to rotate vertically. (Note: Portable air coolers are not suitable for cooling the entire room.)

✔ Energy saving and health: This portable air cooler has low energy consumption and is freon-free. Not only does it protect the health of your family, it also consumes only 3.5 watts of power to minimize energy loss and protect the environment. Ideal for summer living room, bedroom, office, etc. cooling. Can also be used at work and travel.

✔ Easy to operate and lightweight: Just add water or ice water, then plug the USB cable into a mobile power supply or any USB interface, and you can use the portable mini air cooler by pressing the function button.

✔ 100% after-sales service: Our store uses international logistics, you can contact us at any time by email, we will answer your questions within 24 hours, the customer is always the first, you can find yourself by searching for "DUYER" Favorite products, I wish you a happy shopping!
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: desk fan usb quiet mini cooling battery handheld portable rechargeable turbo lcd touch screen, 3-speed mode easy to operate retro design 4inch bedroom office living room speeds turbofan 35w energy saving powered with led
